column5: Private locking bedroom & full bathroom. Queen size bed with memory foam mattress, bedroom includes tv, refrigerator, closet w/ hangers, & curtains w/blinds. Locking bathroom has shower/bathtub, hairdryer, plus coffee pot, & cups. Our home is perfect for business travelers who need quiet to work or to rest as well as for tourists who want to experience museums, theme parks, cultural events/activities, live music concerts, sporting events, rodeos, & the best Tex Mex.
